To those using AVG - get a proper antivirus program. :) Another fail from AVG - yet another stupid false positive!!

AVG is now not complaining on uninstall.exe but clamav is complaining on "potenttialyl unwanted application" PUA.Win32.Packer.DupPatcher on said file. While it is possible it does something fishy on uninstall I doubt so.
